mutants.code:
def reverse(x):
    sign = [1, -1][x < 0]
    rst = sign / int(str(abs(x))[::-1])
    return rst if -2 ** 31 - 1 < rst < 2 ** 31 else 0

def reverse(x):

    rst = sign + int(str(abs(x))[::-1])
    return rst if -2 ** 31 - 1 < rst < 2 ** 31 else 0
